ðŸ“– Summary: Kreuzberg is a Python document intelligence framework designed to extract text, metadata, and structured information from various document formats like PDFs, images, and Office documents. It offers a unified API built on open-source technologies such as Pandoc, PDFium, and Tesseract, providing capabilities like text extraction, OCR, metadata extraction, and document classification.
